SEARCH
Package control

Class CareerCenterStaffController

java.lang.Object
control.BaseController
control.CareerCenterStaffController
public class CareerCenterStaffController extends BaseController
Controller for Career Centre staff operations.

Provides company registration approval, internship approval/rejection, withdrawal management and reporting features.

    • viewAllInternships

      public List<Internship> viewAllInternships(List<String> statusFilters, List<String> levelFilters, List<String> companyFilters, List<String> majorFilters)
      View all internships applying optional filters.
      Parameters:
      statusFilters - list of statuses to include (null/empty = include all)
      levelFilters - list of levels to include (null/empty = include all)
      companyFilters - list of companies to include (null/empty = include all)
      majorFilters - list of preferred majors to include (null/empty = include all)
      Returns:
      filtered and sorted list of internships
